```{asis notes, include=FALSE}
.footnote[vincent clemson]
<div class="my-footer"><span>modernizing the m&a workflow</span></div>
# R Markdown Part I - Introduction
.author[### vincent clemson]

When a `.class` is on its own, it creates a `div` tag.
When a `.class` is inside a `#` header, it creates a `span` tag.

For kunoichi, need to add footer NOT as <div></div>

.my-footer[
  <span>modernizing the m&a workflow</span>
]
```
